text:
@mjrowland68 @BreakfastNews Australia has come out of Covid-19 better than most (so far). Some of that is about Morrison heading away from his, and his party's ideologies re Neoliberalism. So 👏👏👏

However, they have done many, many bad things. The worst is definitely lying to the public over Climate Chge
